extendedInfo.description: Now you can experience the best in retro gaming on-the-go with Dragonâs Lair on your Android device! Both the phone and tablet editions included for one low price!Immerse yourself in the visually stunning world of hand-drawn animation adapted from the original smash hit arcade classic. Transferred from the original high definition master film, youâll experience this fully arcade authentic experience right in the palm of your hand.Simply press on the direction pad to guide our hero Dirk The Daring in the correct direction. Use your sword to take on all that the Evil Wizard Mordroc throws your way.This version of Don Bluth's Dragonâs Lair is fully compatible with Android 1.6 through to the current release. In fact weâve included full compatibility for phones and tablets! Weâve even remastered the footage for a variety of screen resolutions so all devices can experience Dragonâs Lair in all its glory.Please note that we recommend you utilizing Wi-Fi connection to download Dragonâs Lair. Though downloading the full game may take some time after the initial download, youâre in for an awesome retro gaming experience.Enjoy!Dragon's Lair is XPERIA PLAY Optimized. Note: please ignore all marketplace updates unless the version moves to 2.0.--------------Discover all that Digital Leisure Offers:Web: http://www.digitalleisure.com/android/games/Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DigitalLeisureTwitter: http://www.twitter.com/digitalleisure--------------

reviews.title: Just Awesome
reviews.comment: From my tablet to my Google TV device (SainSmart SS808), this app works splendidly.  If you are using a Google TV device you will need a keyboard.  use arrow keys for up down left & right.  use U to use the sword.  Well supported app and easily worth the price.
reviews.author: David Berg

reviews.title: Just as it should be.
reviews.comment: I played this when it first came out. I then got it on the PS2 DVD version. Now on android. Works great and is the exact same game. I\'m going to be spending a lot of time with Dirk.  Worth the price.
reviews.author: Dave Ryan

reviews.title: Can someone help?
reviews.comment: I have a Motorola RAZR and this game WILL NOT WORK.  Tried uninstalling and installing again - nothing.  Menu works  but I get a blank screen with the controls when I try to play a game.  Advice?  ?????????
reviews.author: Glenn Abersold

reviews.title: It\'s the real thing
reviews.comment: Come on, it\'s Dragon\'s Lair! I mean, the game part is awful and frustrating, nobody loves quick time events. But it\'s Dragon\'s Lair! Hilarious animation and a piece of gaming history!
reviews.author: Russell Glasser

reviews.title: Please Fix
reviews.comment: Crashed when i try to download the  game please help my phone is HTC X One (m7)
reviews.author: Abdullah y m

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.comment: I loved this since I wasa kid....great game
reviews.author: izyreal yesndeed

reviews.title: Installation problems - Resolved
reviews.comment: Installation problems have finally stopped. Install complete and enjoyment begun! *********************** Previous review: I long to be taken back to my childhood gaming days and finally finish the adventures of Dragon\'s Lair that I never got to finish in the arcade. I would love to give this a 5 star, but the consistent installation problems are keeping me from doing that.  The DEMO version worked great, so I took the plunge and bought the full version, eagerly anticipating the journey down memory lane. Alas, all I get are frozen screens during the download and unpacking of additional resources. I\'ve tried multiple, multiple times and it keeps getting stuck at different spots along the installation. Sometimes at Loading, sometimes at Unpacking, but always before finishing. When or If I ever get the installation completed, I will love it and hold it and stroke it gently, telling it what an amazing piece of retro gaming history it is. But until then ... 1 star and no love for you!  ASUS Transformer Prime TF201
reviews.author: Erik Kershaw

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: A great trip down memory lane.  The animation is better than I remember,  and the audio sent nostalgic chills down my spine.  I doubt people that didn\'t play Dragon\'s Lair back in the day would enjoy it as muxh as those that have, but its a great game still, in my opinion anyways.
reviews.author: M Smith

reviews.title: Trouble unpacking
reviews.comment: I\'m able to download the game, and download the extra resources. But it only unpacks 30 percent of the extra resources, and then says error downloading. i have room on  my device, but how do i get it to completely unpack the resources successfully ? somebody please help
reviews.author: Frank Adams

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Takes me back to the days of awesome arcade games. Graphics are amazing on HTC One X+.
reviews.author: Brian Theodore

reviews.title: Replica
reviews.comment: Works fine now!!
reviews.author: Larry Broadie

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Never gets boring!
reviews.author: Veronika Shaw

reviews.title: Dragons lair
reviews.comment: I loved this game as a kid and never hot to finish it and was so excited to get it......and it flat out doesn\'t work. The free version does fine but the paid version just freezes at start and i can\'t get ahold of tech support
reviews.author: Mike Hall

reviews.title: Spot on
reviews.comment: Having dumped rolls of quarters in the arcade in this game, I can tell you the arcade version of this game is spot on. The options are nice, but I still like the challenge of figuring out the scenarios without the guide. Very good.
reviews.author: Franklin Gannan

reviews.comment: Best Old School Game Ever !! WAY AHEAD OF IT\'S TIME !!
reviews.author: Daniel Schaefer

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Every time you die u have to see the same cinematic over and over.  It gets very old...also needs different modes of difficulty..
reviews.author: Larry Jasper

reviews.title: Timeless!
reviews.comment: Just like the arcade!
reviews.author: Chris Calderone

reviews.comment: Wth ? I bought this game and its telling me it needs resorces and is going to take 2 hours to download , wth ? Dragon use to be great but this has made you lose a lot of credit which is sad cause I had my hopes up on this game all it did was steal 5 bucks from me !!!!
reviews.author: Freddy Voorhees

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I downloaded bought it won\'t even open to play..very dispointed
reviews.author: Melinda Shell

reviews.title: Error installing update after download
reviews.comment: I keep getting error please try again later after install. If this keeps up ill refuse tge withdraw for purchase
reviews.author: michael castleberry
